command.description: View file output and link grafana
command.script: echo " " echo "*********************************************************************" echo "*********************** OUTPUT FILE *********************************" echo "*********************************************************************" echo "View Output FILE and grafana link to check serial-number result at one of the link bellow:" export HOPDONG_NAME=$(echo "@option.list_hd@") export output_dir=$(echo "@option.output_dir@") hd=$(echo "@option.list_hd@") path_template="$output_dir/$HOPDONG_NAME/ATP" if ! [ -z "${HOST_IP}" ]; then # echo "Link to download files result ATP" echo "Link Grafana to view serial number ATP status panel" else ips=$(ip addr | awk '/^[0-9]+:/ { currentinterface=$2; } /inet / && currentinterface !~ /^(docker0|veth|br|lo)/ { split($2, parts, "/"); print parts[1]; }') readarray -t IPs <<<"$ips" for ip in "${IPs[@]}"; do echo "Link Grafana to view serial number ATP status panel with $ip" # echo "Link Grafana to view serial number planning view panel with $ip" echo "---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------" done fi
